data.title: Anna Lee Ruff Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Anna Lee Ruff, age 77, passed away on September 16, 2021.Anna was born on October 31, 1943 in West, TX to Ben Cox and Louise Cox. Anna married Kenneth Ruff of Beggs, Oklahoma on...
data.text:
Anna Lee Ruff, age 77, passed away on September 16, 2021.

Anna was born on October 31, 1943 in West, TX to Ben Cox and Louise Cox. Anna married Kenneth Ruff of Beggs, Oklahoma on July 10, 1975 in Reno, Nevada.

She was preceded in death by Ben Cox (Father), Louise Cox (Mother).

Anna is survived by her husband Kenneth Ruff, children Kenny and wife Delana Ruff, Katrina Fenton, Jimmy Rich, Larry Rich, Kathy Strawniak and husband Larry, and Sharon Quinn; grandchildren, Kelly Reader, Levi Ruff, Tyler Fenton, Terra Fenton, Holli McDow, Jason Rich, Robbie Quinn, Dennis Quinn and many great grandchildren.

Anna's favorite charity was the Okmulgee Humane Society Animal Shelter.

Anna will be most remembered for her lifelong love of horses and rodeo. Anna was her happiest when she was with her horses. One major accomplishment of Anna's was in 2001 when she was awarded the 3D National Barrel Horse Association Senior State Champion for Oklahoma.

Anna was a school bus driver for Glenpool Public Schools for 25 years and took great pride in her service to the school's transportation department. Anna enjoyed all of her kids that she drove and had many stories of multiple generations of children that rode her bus over the years.

Services have been entrusted to Schaudt Funeral Service. Friends & family may leave condolences and kind words of comfort at www.schaudtfuneralservice.com
